titleStmt.title: England's heroical epistles, written in imitation of the stile and manner of Ovid's Epistles with annotations of the chronicle history / by Michael Drayton, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D. Heroides.

notesStmt.note: "To the stationer on this new and correct impression" signed: Edwine Sadleyr, baronet.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
